name: VICTIMS OF TERRORISM -- BEIRUT MARINE CORPS BARRACKS BOMBING
sampleDescriptions: S.1529, A bill to make additional financial assets of the Government of Iran available to pay compensatory damages to the victims of terrorism sponsored by that Government, and for other purposes.
